entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Made by Ziyang CHEN, Rocky, 陈子阳

Introduction

Hi, 我叫陈子阳，是香港理工大学计算机系金融科技与人工智能专业的大二学生。
Hi, I‘m Chen Ziyang, a sophomore majoring in financial technology and Artificial Intelligence at the Department of Computer Science, Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

我对经济、软件开发和区块链技术都很感兴趣。
I’m interested in Economics & Software Development & Blockchain Technology.
